Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: I was hesitant to go to this place for a number of years. It was because it was right around the time that a wave of Thai restraints opened around the city. Some where terrible. ‚Ä¶

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Very delicious and authentic thai food, we ordered Panaeng curry and it was outstanding! Would definitely recommend and come back.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: my favourite Thai place in the hood. Especially recommend the panang curry vegetarian, it doesn't show up in the vegetarian menu but you can always request the version with tofu and veggies, delicious!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Small but cosy corner restaurant in one of my favourite neighbors of Amsterdam. They offer a broad variety of dishes, vegetarian options are available and visible in the last page of the menu (if you are vegan please remind them to avoid ‚Ä¶

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text:
OMG!!! The best authentic Thai food I have had outside of Thailand!!! Amazing food!
Cannot remember last time I have been so positively surprised. ‚Ä¶

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: A nice place with nice people and good priced. It's good pad thai and food (not the best i have tried in Europe) but considerably tasty ;)

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Very friendly staff and the food was delicious. I had the best spring rolls of my life there!!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: One of the best Thai food I‚Äôve tasted outside Thailand!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: You don‚Äôt get it very often that employees of a restaurant are just kind, friendly and open without asking anything in return! On the run home I realized that I had no more chopsticks at home and as I was having some noodles for dinner I ‚Ä¶

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Very friendly host and incredible cook.  Amazingly authentic Thai cuisine. Try... Everything (that means, come back a few times ;) )

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: We ordered through their own renewed website, which offers a great variety of delicious options you can not find in other apps. Food arrived blazing fast and it was absolutely delicious. Kind people, with amazing Thai food!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Best flavour in Thai curry I found in Amsterdam! Brings me back memories of my time in magnificent Thailand! Great for pickup, very polite people.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Pains me to write a really poor review for a small local shop. I was expecting good food based on the high star reviews... but i was really disappointed. First off the staff was friendly and nice. But the food overall was poor. The chicken ‚Ä¶

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: I was going down this street to the Fjallraven store which is next door.  Good smells guided me to this tiny restaurant where everything is prepared in last minute. My papaya salad was delicious. The seasonings are authentic. I loved it and will come back on a future visit to Amsterdam.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text:
Original review below. Edited because they delivered a good experience!

Edit: Authentic Thai food. Enjoyed their shrimp with green curry ‚Ä¶

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Our absolute favourite Thai food in Amsterdam!! Authentic, lip smacking delicious and our go to place - eat here at least once a month and the owner/manager is really nice as well!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Simple little restaurant and takeaway. Nothing fancy or posh. It's the most friendly people ever that make this place very special! We came in 15 minutes after their closing time which wasn't a problem at all for them. So welcoming! We ‚Ä¶

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text:
Delicious! I absolutely recommend number 29, Kai phad phed.
After having it for the first time I directly came back the next day for another round.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Small establishment - maybe 4-5 tables. Excellent food. The food is a little spicy, even my daughters sweet and sour chicken had a little kick to it. The owner cooks the food herself. She and her husband were both extremely friendly. I will definitely go there again.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: The food is so good, I totally forgot to take a picture. Super friendly ppl that work there too. üëåüëåüëå‚ù§Ô∏è chef has a great singing voice üòä

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Very tasty. I typically go there for take away food and it has always been delicious. I like their pad Thai and curries.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Here on bike tour. The shrimp kha soup coconut was delicious I enjoyed it sooo much. The staff are soo friendly and nice the noodles were delicious as well.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: This is a small restaurant located close to Prisengracht. Prices are very reasonable given the quality of the food. They are so delicious and the portions are big! We tried fish and shrimp meal, there are really tasty spicy options. Green curry with vis was my favourite!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text:
Really, really excellent. Most authentic Thai food (and hospitality) i have found in the EU.
I ate here months ago and i still can¬¥t stop thinking about it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Nice, little but very super-good Thai !!!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Very good masaman curry, my favorite thai curry and this one is fairly good, maybe a bit expensive. We also had the chicken satay that was average and some spring rolls that were quite good. Its very small inside but it was not too busy

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: brilliant no fuss thai food.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Perfect service and really friendly!! Also made us special prices because i only wanted rice. so they are flexible! Will visit again if we go to Amsterdam again! 15/10

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Great spring rolls and noodles!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Good quality and fairly priced Thai food. Will definitely be back to try the other dishes!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Our go-to Thai. Had a Tom yum gai and Tofu Pad thai. Both excellent.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Best authentic thai food. Fresh ingredients used and food made in front of u. Friendly staff and quick service. Very small place, but good and hot food. Very pricy compare to Uk thai places, but its normal Amsterdam Central price. Best thing is they serve halal meat.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: I ordered Tom Yum soup(Tom Ka Khai) with coconut thinking it'd have spicy tomato broth with coconut but instead it was just sweet coconut soup. They should write on their menu that it's a sweet coconut soup. Not what i wanted and they wouldnt event change it if you ask.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Not a restaurant to go to for a romantic or business meeting, though whenever you are craving a fresh and healthy meal, something mild and flavorfull or very spicy, one of the crisp salads or the best Thom Kah Kai ever - yes. This is definitely the place to go to, to sooth those desires!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: went here based on the great reviews. everything is made fresh and they were super nice but sadly the food wasn't that great. the pad Thai was pretty bland and the red curry wasn't great either.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Ordered on the 14th, Tom kha kai, was toooo sweet.... Red curry was not hot at all and maybe even a bit too bland veggies very soggy... Sadly disappointing.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Tight place (cozy). Food is excellent. You can see it being made right behind your table. Service is good and quick. Value is on point. Highly recommend!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: My favorite thai in Amsterdam.  Always try to get a meal here when I'm in town.  Small dining area, nothing fancy, but good fresh food.  Very flavorful.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Great taste! Friendly owner! Strongly recommend

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: We had dinner here on a friend's recommendation. As others have said, the restaurant feels very homey and welcoming. Lekkie, the chef, is very nice, and we had a great time.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: We tried a few different dishes and everything was excellent - tasty, fast, and well-priced. One of the best meals we had in Amsterdam!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Delicious and authentic thai food with very fair prices!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Nice food, nice boss! They serve can of coke (330ml) at $2 only which is really price friendly compare everywhere in Nethersland.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Love the food and thai smiles, hospitality  from the chefs. The place is pretty small but you will always feel welcome, very nice!!!

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Authentic Thai food in a tiny restaurant in a corner building. The food is delicious and the owners are very friendly and welcoming. Otherwise a very simple venue.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Very good and authentic Thai food , prices are honest and the people working there are very polite and nice .

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Good food, great quantity but a bit expensive.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: Kratiam Thai, Warie and KoChang; my favourite Thai restaurants/take aways.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: The flavor is popular, price is good. As a tourist, I felt pleasant and welcome from this restaurant.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
Review Text: An amazing Thai restaurant! One of the best in the year. Small place, but the food is bursting with favour

Review Text: Good vegetarian options including Spring rolls , great Thai cuisine. Reasonable prices. Recommended

Review Text: Ordered on Uber eats food was really disappointing, the fish in the soup was fried with batter. This in combination with soup makes it‚Äôs like wet bread.

Name: Warie's Thai Food
